sections.header: Prior to PICC Line or Midline Catheter Insertion the competent clinician will:
questions: Review patient chart for: Physician Order (for midline Catheter insertion the physician order is for fluids or a standard peripheral catheter)
Review patient chart for: Patient Allergies
Review patient chart for: Patient coagulation status
Review patient chart for: Patient contradictions to vascular access placement
Review patient chart for: Patient labs and medical history
Explain: Obtain signed consent form (PICC Line Only)
Identify, Evaluate & Select: Appropriate insertion site

Identify, Evaluate & Select: Measure arm width
Set-up equipment and sterile field with sterile technique/ Utilize universal precautions/utilize full barrier precautions

sections.header: During PICC Line and Midline Insertion:
questions: Perform Appropriate: Advance catheter (check patient positioning of head)
Perform Appropriate: Suture or utilize securing method

Document in patient medical record: allergies

Assess need for catheter tip culture and/or blood cultures
Removal Process: Assess patient and site
